description.raw:
According to [changes coming to current gazebo default branch](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/), remove the `ENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION` cmake parameter from the installation from source tutorial and add 'make tests' to compilation from source as an optional step.

I've removed the support for gazebo4 (deprecated) and create a copy of current tutorial for gazebo5,6,7.
